txt.en: Brúvraum can be found north-west of Maergrind.\n\nYou should explore Brúvraum for Varthmath.
You have successfully defeated gredbyg and collected grodbog hive samples for Varthmath. You should meet with Varthmath at Asbaj-khîrfin once you have completed your tasks.
Brúvraum can be found north-west of Maergrind.\n\nYou should defeat gredbyg and collect samples from the hive.
The gredbyg here have completely encased the hall in their hives

'One of the grodbog hives that I wish to explore is the old hall to the water-works, called Brúvraum. While you are there, could you collect some samples of their hive? I would like to study its properties.'
Varthmath seeks to learn more about the grodbog presence in Máttugard.
Defeated gredbyg and collected grodbog hive samples.
